items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Itâ€™s a TRUE maxi! Love the long length!!
items.body: This dress is SO cute! I love the way it fits and itâ€™s a REAL maxi! I am 5â€™ 7â€ and most midis or shorter maxis look really awkward on me. I love that this one is LONG! Not sure how it would be on a shorter person but it hits right at my ankles. It washed super easy (I did hang it to dry so not sure about how it does in the dryer). I love that it has pockets and the color is absolute beautiful. Super natural and nice (I got the light blue with the black trim.) Because it is flowy, I can easily nurse by pulling my arm out of the strap! Read more
items.author: H. Garza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars do yourself a favor and buy this dress
items.body: This dress!!!!! I was concerned I was going to look frumpy in this dress since there is not much actual shape to it. Boy was I wrong. The linen material makes it look so upscale, you can adjust the straps to make it perfect for you. The toe in the back does not do much, but it gives you a little something extra for such a simple dress. The pockets are nice and deep. I can honestly say I do not have a single negative thing to say about this dress. I get so many compliments every time I wear it, and itâ€™s probably the most comfortable piece of clothing I own. The straps are thin so a strapless bra is ideal, but Iâ€™m not into those torture devices. Luckily the linen material is thick enough and the dress does not hug your body in anyway I am able just to wear the silicone nipple covers. And no one is the wiser to what I have on underneath. This dress is my favorite purchase of 2025, so much so I bought other colors. I have worn flip flops with them, tennis shoes with a jean jacket, ballet flats with lots of jewelry to dress it up. The dress is pretty much great for any occasion. Youâ€™re crazy if you do not buy the dress. I am 5â€™2â€ and 122 pounds and bought a size small. Read more
items.author: Tara busch

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect summer dress
items.body: Gorgeous dress, material is amazing and it has pockets! Only complaint I think others should Know about is that colors might fade upon washing. I ordered the lavender and washed it before wearing out and the color faded and turned pink in blotches and made it unwearable :( could probably hand wash and might get a better turn out but in my case Iâ€™m ordering a new one but Iâ€™ll be going with a neutral color. Read more
items.author: John M McDowell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 5 star plus summer dress.
items.body: Great summer dress. Great fit and impeccable detail and style. Just ordered another one in a different color. Definitely a 5 star garment. Fabric is terrific. Read more

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Dress
items.body: I purchased this dress to wear to a holiday party and was so happy with it! At 5'2", itâ€™s hard to find long dresses that donâ€™t drag on the floor, but this one fit perfectly. The tie option in the back is a huge plusâ€”it really helps keep everything in place, if you know what I mean ðŸ˜‰ Comfortable, flattering, and easy to dress up. I felt confident and got lots of compliments. Highly recommend, especially for petite heights! Read more
items.author: Jaime Wright

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to love it
items.body: This looks so good on the model and influencers but just looks like a potato sack on me. The top fits perfectly but the rest just hangs and is way too much fabric. It is also slightly itchy. I wanted to love it but itâ€™s just not it, and way too expensive for what you get Read more
items.author: Erin

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great summer dress!
items.body: SO cute! The color is as shown and it sits high enough that a bra isnâ€™t needed, even with a large bust. My friends all got the link from me to order after seeing it! Decent quality for the price as well. Read more
items.author: AJtrooper

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Maxi Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue Stone, Light Blue, Flaxen, Lotus Pink, Irish Coffee, Light Green, Black, Deep Apricot, Light Purple, Brick Red, Ginger Yellow. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
